title: UXSpec
description: Complete UX specification for a single experience (visual, voice, chat, SMS)

experience.description: Delivery modality this spec describes. 'visual': screen-based UI; 'voice': voice assistant interface; 'chat': conversational messaging UI; 'sms': text message-based interaction.

source.description: Reference to the design artifact (e.g., Figma file, Storybook, or internal design system URL) that this spec is based on.

views.description: List of ux.view specNodeIds that comprise the routable screens of this experience.

states.description: List of ux.experiencestate specNodeIds that represent the top-level states of this experience's state machine.
